As a snack, it's a bit dry for my taste and isn't as sweet as the delicious Quaker 100% Natural, but I quite enjoyed it with milk.  Its crunchy texture is just right and the chocolate is a treat.  If you like granola, this is a good one.  A good source of fiber.
So glad to find this product at a sensible price.  A bit less flavor, being "light," but still a good taste and so much better for you than many alternatives.

Yeah it's gluten free and whatever, but unless that's a really big issue for you and you're having trouble finding sugary drinks to enjoy on your gluten-free diet, there's no real draw to this drink over say, orange fanta or any number of other carbonated juice type drinks. I thought it was massively overly sweet, and I have something of a sweet tooth. The orange flavor wasn't particularly authentic or delicious, and it left a sour aftertaste. I got a free sample this time, and I cannot see actually paying money to buy this product again. On an environmental note, packaging and shipping these things in tiny little cans makes for more waste, and I don't appreciate that either. Not a fan.

Don't be fooled buy the calorie count on this product, most people consider low calorie products to be less filling. I'm surprised at this tasty and filling meal in a can. I purchased this item on a whim, and glad that I did. Will purchase again for sure.
I'm not sure what else to say, but it is a very tasty syrup.  It comes in a pretty standard bottle, but it was packet very well and arrived in fine shape.

After drinking Swiss Miss watered down hot chocolates taste for so long, this is a very tasty creamy hot chocolate. My kids love it so I tried it and its the best I had in a while. I will be ordering more.

My first meal replacement was Slim Fast, unfortunatly it didn't work for me. Before I decided to try this product, I did some research. This is a good protein shake. It has 180 calories and 30g of protein! Low sugar compare to other drinks. I drink it once/day after a 1 hour workout for five days a week. The chocolate tastes great. No need to add the extras like ice, juices, or fruits for better taste. Instantly stopped my hunger for a couple of hours. Gives me a good amount of energy. Not gassy! The packets are great for traveling. UPDATE - 3/10/11 So far, chocolate it the best flavor. Vanilla tastes like lite sweet milk. Haven't tried strawberry yet.
I love my hot chocolate, But this one is very weak, I have to add a little syrup to give it a more chocolate taste.

This has a strong granny smith apple taste. I eat apples all the time, so if anyone says otherwise they are mistaken. Same texture, just a different and better taste. Now I'm purchasing three packs a week because it taste so good. Tasty enough to substitute an unhealthy dessert for this tasty treat.
I am trying to get away from drinking diet soda so I decided to try sparking water with lemon.  I love the taste of this brand and Amazon has a great price.
Seriously?? 5 calories!?! These are so good. And even better if you add a little bit to them if you know what I mean! :)

I enjoy many other flavors of crystal light, but I got bored of them all for a long time. Recently I bought a container of the Mojito flavor and I'm hooked!  Great taste, like a children's version of a mojito.  I drink a lot more water/liquid each day because of these little packets.  Great alternative to diet soft drinks and water.
A coworker just brought these into the office--surprisingly good! Sweet and tangy with a good crunch, unlike dried pineapple but not too greasy. wow! Definitely check these out if you get a chance.

I was anxious to try this, but upon the first sip it was apparent to me that this drink was not going to go well for me.  It has a very sharp/harsh citrus-y metallic flavor and combined with the overwhelming sweetness, the two seem to battle it out in my mouth for dominance.  After awhile it seemed like the drink was going down more like syrup more than a carbonated beverage.  The can is small at 8.3 oz (a regular sized pop can is 12 oz) and the cost of these little guys seem a little bit astronomical.  I also am a bit dubious of its attempts to seem like a healthy alternative to pop.  It still has loads of sugar in it.  So when they claim "no additional sugar" this may lead you to believe no sugar or low sugar... but it does in fact have 34 grams.

I like it!  It's got the same after taste as the granulated, if you're wondering.  I find it pleasant.  Used it in coffee today and it was the perfect sweetness (and actually once it was in coffee, to me it was the same flavor as sugar - with no aftertaste). I don't like splenda very much and can't stand sweet n low. Been using stevia for a few months and got this to stir into yogurt. Excited!  Didn't realize it had to be refrigerated, but that was just my own ignorance.  Was hesitant, but now I highly recommend the SweetLeaf stevia clear!

These are delicious, it's been hard to find a good stewed tomato,the kind my mom used to can.  This is very close. A real fresh tomato taste and seasoned perfectly. Other brands have a tinny taste to them and usually are too sweet.
Small, just right for a little something sweet.  Ginger flavor is good, it comes on gradually until it is almost intense.  A bargain.

I am already a fan of Newman's Own Organics line of products.  I think they are generally high quality, reasonably priced and have a great track record as a charitable organization.  So, I was really looking forward to trying out the Pomegranate Licorice.  When you first open the package, you can immediately smell the sweet sugary fruit scent of pomegranate.  The next thing you notice is the rich red, well pomegranate, color.  One thing I liked right off the bat is that the licorice sticks are not super long like a Twizzler.  They are shorter and more manageable to eat.  They are a also not overly sticky and do not leave a sticky residue on your fingers.  Taste wise, they are great.  Perhaps my favorite aspect of this licorice is that they are not super sweet.  While they have a strong sugary smell, they are not obnoxiously sweet like Twizzlers.  The licorice has a nice chewy texture and trends towards soft.  The pomegranate taste is subtle.  At first you cannot taste it at all, instead tasting the sugar and gelatin flavors.  As you chew the pomegranate taste grows and by the end has a nice strong flavor.  The pomegranate flavor is also very good.  I haven't ate too many raw pomegranates but I do like the POM juice products.  This licorice compares well against the POM juice products.  So, as a nice treat to share with the family, I highly recommend.
i've used stevia for a long time and love the natural product.  this is a good price as I normally spend around $15 for only one bottle half the size of these 4 oz ones.

We used to raise Montmorency cherries, and these dried cherries are the real deal. As dried fruit, they're perfect: moist, chewy, and wonderfully flavorful. They make a wonderfully energizing snack at the office. Though I generally don't like added sugar on dried fruits, it's really necessary to counteract the cherries' naturally tart taste. Reconstituted, I'm guessing they'd be perfect for tart cherry pies. Certainly the flavor is everything I remember in a really good tart cherry pie, which is almost impossible to find these days.
I really like these bars.  The only downside is that they contain Maltitol and half of the protein is Soy.  I am not a big soy fan. Peanut butter is the best.
If you are a fan of black licorice then you will really enjoy these licorice bears. They are soft yet chewy with a rich licorice flavor.

In my attempt to buy healthier snacks that don't have high fructose corn syrup, artificial sweeteners and processed sugar, I discovered these Raw Revolution bars.  They are GREAT!  We've tried several flavors and love them.  They are great for on-the-go snacks and are made with whole ingredients.

This drink tastes as good or better than similar drinks that we've had that are made of powder.  The directions don't tell you how much to squeeze into your water, so I would imagine it depends on how big of a glass or bottle you have and how strong you want it to taste.  You can always add more.  The only concern I have about it is there is caffeine in it and I really don't want to have any extra caffeine after my coffee in the morning.  You might want to beware of that if you are buying this for children.
Walnuts are an extremely healthy snack if eaten in moderation (one serving is 200 calories).  I especially like them as a salad topper.
These make a great snack. Not too sweet and an excellent way to get fiber into your diet

The Tanka Bars I purchased were moist, solid, tasty without too much salt or sweetener, and a small amount alleviated hunger for several hours at a time. As I diabetic type II I often have hunger pangs throughout the day. Pieces from one bar provided my body with enough energy to make it dinner time without the need for a sugar lift. This helped me maintain a steady blood glucose level all day. A little bit goes a long way so it should not be gobbled like an energy bar. The taste will tempt you to do so. It is pricey, but certainly worth it. I keep several in my Go-Bag.

I tried the Black Cherry version and liked it but this one is much better.  Great orange taste plus the benefit of juice.  And no corn syrup sweetner for those worried about its use.  The carbonation helps make it a satisfying drink to quench thirst and the knowledge that it is healthy satisfies the mind as well.

Looks like and tastes like chocolate colored water. No chocolate flavor whatsoever, this was a complete disappointment.  I got the hot chocolate k-cups from swiss miss instead.  How people can be giving this product four and five stars is astounding to me, is the Amazon ratings system being gamed for this product?

This is not orange and tangerine juice; it's mainly apple and grape juice flavored with orange and tangerine. And I really don't care about the vitamin C content; vitamin C is easy to get.  What I do care about is that this is definitely the worst-tasting soda of any type that I have ever tried. I couldn't pour it down the drain fast enough.

zico probably has the best taste of the coconut water brands I've tried.  This passion fruit flavor is great, refreshing & not too sweet.  I'm not a fan of the unflavored kinds.  I've tried zico's mango but prefer the passion fruit over it.

I'm a big fan of avoiding corn syrup and a lot of the other ingredients that go into most processed foods and beverages these days, so this beverage idea really sounded good to me.  It doesn't contain a bunch of artificial junk in it, and it still tastes pretty good.  I could definitely drink more of these.  They won't ever be my favorite beverage, but then I'm more of a non-carbonated kind of drinker anyway.  This is definitely a good alternative to other products out there, and I'd like to try other flavors as well.

I wasn't sure what to expect with this, but upon tasting it (very chilled), I have to admit, it's pretty darn tasty!  To give you an idea of what it tastes like:  Take orange juice.  Give it the familiar "bite" of your favorite carbonated beverage.  Add a little tangerine for a slight citrus aftertaste, and there you go.  Basically, it looks and smells like orange juice, but it tastes like orange pop *should* taste, if it really tasted like oranges.  My wife said it reminded her of Minute Maid orange pop (or, as she would call it, orange *soda*).  Our four-year-old son is eager to drink pop because he sees mom and dad do it occassionally, but we generally don't let him.  After reading the nutritional information on the can and seeing that there's no added sugar, corn syrup, preservatives, or artificial flavors, I can admit that I would have no problem letting him drink this instead of juice occassionally (but not *too* often, as it is quite a bit of sugar!).  My wife made the observation that this drink would probably make a fantastic mixer for adult beverages.  Sadly, the sample we received was not enough to test this theory, but it should make a really, really good screwdriver.
5 stars on taste. Beef tastes like it was grilled before it was added to the chili. The only thing that concerns me is the 11 grams of sugar. That can't be good for you.
I love the KIND bars.  They taste great and are much healthier than other bars.  Also they satisfy your taste for something sweet so are healthier than eating candy.

I like Nature Valley granola bars because they fill me up better than other brands, such as Special K or the Quaker Oats granola bars. They're also chewy and sweet, great for a snack or a quick breakfast. My only complaint is that it is a little too sweet.
Chips Ahoy cookies were not very tasty.  My children and husband would not eat them.  I tried to give them away and everyone refused.

I love this stuff! I could drink it all day long! Nice and smooth going down and extremely refreshing! The amount you get for the price is just perfect. I have caught flack because it is "expensive" but this is the best Coconut Water on the market.

I tried another of these Switch products and was less than pleased, but maybe it was the flavor which I think was supposed to be watermelon. The black cherry went down a lot easier although it's still a tad too acidic for me. But it tastes good, you know, like black cherry.  Brian W. Fairbanks

I have never had any hot chocolate that tastes better than this. Not homemade, not from starbucks, not from Swissmiss... This is hands down the best I've ever had. I go through so much of this stuff because whenever friends come over, they go straight for it.  But what happened to the price? Most k-cups run from about $0.45 - $0.65 but Amazon has these things going for $0.92. Even Bed Bath & Beyond has them cheaper than that. Bring the price back down to something reasonable and your 5-star review will return.

This product advertises that it is a soda made from 100% fruit juices and is refreshing.  I was quite disapointed in the flavor. If you have ever been unfortunate enough to drink canned (not refrigerated or fresh squeezed) OJ you know there is a HUGE differance in flavor. The bad, almost rotting component is carried over into this soda. IT even carries a rather odd aftertaste. I was not able to finish the entire can.  This may be a feature of the Orange flavor. Other fruit flavors of this product might indeed taste good. But I recommend skilling the orange version.
"These were very good. Bought three 36 count boxes and only two pieces were a little bit hard on the top layer of the petite four. Would not hesitate to buy again, very, very good."

There's nothing wrong with this drink, but it really just tastes like any other orange soda.  Kudos to The Switch for not adding artificial flavors, sugar, or corn syrup, though.  It tastes pretty clean and refreshing, but a bit expensive for what it is.  Don't let the small-sized can (8.3oz) fool you, this isn't an energy drink, it's just an orange soda.
These are going to be a hit at my wedding.  Haven't tried them yet, but who doesn't love a Hershey Kiss?!?!?!

I like my chocolate tempered to some level of crispness. These nuts were chewy, not crunchy, and the chocolate coating was a bit mealy. If you know anything about dark chocolate, and like yours with some snap, don't order these.  Actually, the best dark chocolate covered walnuts are called Perigord and are available through a Canadian company called Kis Global. They are sun dried, super crispy, covered in a fairly thin shell of 70% dark chocolate, and dusted with unsweetened cocoa. Very adult and superb.
